title: We need more hot guys in this game!
body: There's plenty of hot girls, and that's fine, but there needs to be hot guys as well! The only guys I can say are attractive to women are Jhin and Kayn. Well, I've heard some friends of mine going on about Darius as well, so I'll add him to the list, but three in the whole roster? That's just unacceptable!

I see what you did there with Brand.
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Wait... Jhin... WHAT?

I know that "beauty is in the eye of the beholder" but... Jhin? he wears a mask all the time... and is an homicidal maniac... in fact he wears TWO masks. How the hell he can be "hot" if no one has ever seen him (and the ones that did, died)?

I would say Jhin's attractiveness tends to come from his interesting personality and his voice. I do agree it sort of doesn't help OP's argument as he's not conventionally attractive, but she is not the only one I've seen say that they find Jhin attractive. 

I think what straight men find attractive and what straight women find attractive can vary wildly. Sure, girls like the shirtless dudes and such, but I also think a fully-clothed suave guy is equally likely to be attractive as well, depending on execution. Personality and voice play a big factor for me personally.

> [{quoted}](name=AbiwonKenabi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sT65vohO,comment-id=000a0001,timestamp=2019-02-21T19:45:55.077+0000)
>
> I would say Jhin's attractiveness tends to come from his interesting personality and his voice. I do agree it sort of doesn't help OP's argument as he's not conventionally attractive, but she is not the only one I've seen say that they find Jhin attractive. 
> 
> I think what straight men find attractive and what straight women find attractive can vary wildly. Sure, girls like the shirtless dudes and such, but I also think a fully-clothed suave guy is equally likely to be attractive as well, depending on execution. Personality and voice play a big factor for me personally.

Sure, the voice and personality can be important... but he is literally an insane assasin.

But, to be fair, some people find Jinx and Lamb atractive as well.

Yeah, with fictional characters, its kind of ok to find even the messed up people attractive. Just because someone finds them attractive doesn't mean they want to be with someone like that. Its just indulging in a fantasy and enjoying a fictional character. 

The problems come when people think that a character like that would actually be romantic in real life. I like Kayn, I find him somewhat attractive and a very interesting character (along with Rhaast) but he also has a lot of major emotional and psychological problems. Actually befriending him would be really scary and probably not good for me.

Bruh

Sylas just came out.
Aww good for him.  Lux needed a GBF
